question: Tell us the differences between uncontrolled and controlled components.
answer: Controlled components have their state and behavior controlled by their parent components. This components depends on prop passed from the parent components to update their state behavior. otherside uncontrolled components manage their own state

question: Tell us the difference between nodejs and express js.
answer: Nodejs is open source and cross platform runtime environment for run javascript code outside of the browser. We can use Node.js for building back-end services like APIs. express js is a framework based on nodejs which is use for building backend server of any apps.
